__str__ ( self )

Print this rule.

  _buildRule  
_buildRule ( self )

Internal function that builds the command string for this rule. Commands to be executed directly are prepended with a &; other lines are commands from a configuration file for ipfilter.

  _getRuleCommand  
_getRuleCommand ( self )

Return a string that is the command to run ipfilter rules.
